title: Snake case
summary: Snake case is a way of writing phrases without spaces, where spaces are replaced with underscores _, and the words are typically all lower case. It's often stylized as "snake_case" to remind the reader of its appearance.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
